description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a shopping cart page, displaying cart items, a header, and bill details with checkout interaction.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the cart page, displaying cart items, header, and checkout options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the cart page, including header, list of cart items, conditional empty message, and bill details card with checkout callback.
